privacy.title: Your Privacy Matters
privacy.content: All your family's information stays right here on this device. Nothing is sent to the cloud or shared with anyone. Everything remains private and under your control.

coppa.title: Safe for Kids
coppa.content: This device is designed for children. We follow strict children's privacy laws (COPPA). Your child's information is never collected or shared without your permission.

gdpr.title: Your Rights (for EU families)
gdpr.content: If you're in the European Union, you have full control over your data. You can view, change, or delete any information stored on this device whenever you want.

liability.title: Important Legal Notice
liability.content: YoyoPod is provided as-is. While we've worked hard to make it safe and reliable, we can't be held responsible for any issues that may arise from using this device.

ai.title: Voice Assistant Features
ai.content: If your device has voice assistant features, conversations can be saved locally for you to review. You can turn this off anytime in settings.

terms.title: Using YoyoPod
terms.content: By using this device, you agree to supervise your child's use and set up the parental controls that work best for your family.
